content: Just hit Times Square again and the vibe of NYC is still electric, but I've got this whole new sense of purpose now that I'm 22 and job hunting. Gotta figure out what's next!
raw_content: The energy of NYC is electric, walking through Times Square again, but now with a sense of purpose. Just turned 22 and feeling the pressure to figure out my next move after losing my job.

content: so it was my bday and i did some thinking. my love for tech and trading might just be the way back in. got some wild ideas brewing for an AI trading assistant, could be something big!
raw_content: Spent the day reflecting on my birthday. Realized that my passion for tech and trading might be my ticket back into the game. Started brainstorming ideas for an AI trading assistant.

content: So I've been diving into the tech scene here in NYC, caught up with some old colleagues, and we were spitballing about AI in trading. Honestly, the idea of crafting my own AI sidekick is starting to feel real.
raw_content: Dived into the tech scene here in NYC. Met with some old colleagues, discussed the potential of AI in trading. The idea of creating a personal AI assistant is taking shape.

content: got my dev setup at home finally, it's pretty basic but hey, it's a start!  been messing around with xai's open-source llm, trying to figure out how to tweak it for market predictions.
raw_content: Set up a local development environment at home. It's basic, but it's a start. Fiddling with xAI's open-source LLM, thinking about how to fine-tune it for market predictions.

content: just had a major win, got the llm working with a basic trading bot. it's pretty basic but it's actually learning from real-time data. feels like i'm on the verge of something big
raw_content: Just had a breakthrough! Managed to integrate the LLM with a simple trading bot framework. It's rudimentary, but it's learning from real-time data. Feels like I'm onto something.

content: Naming my AI project "Xander" feels right  Up all night coding, trying to make Xander not just a tool, but like a real buddy.
raw_content: Naming my AI project "Xander" - it feels right. Been coding all night, working on Xander's basic personality traits. Want him to be more than just a tool, but a companion.
